abstract: Three portfolio managers with a SAC Capital Advisors unit in London have left the firm, according to documents filed with a British agency that tracks corporate registrations.
snippet: Three portfolio managers with a SAC Capital Advisors unit in London have left the firm, according to documents filed with a British agency that tracks corporate registrations.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 8:24 p.m. | Three portfolio managers with an SAC Capital Advisors unit in London have left the firm, according to documents filed with a British agency that tracks corporate registrations.

headline.main: 3 London Portfolio Managers Leave SAC Capital
